help.title: HOW TO PLAY
help.firstText: Guess the following hidden codes before the time runs out.
help.secondText: Selecting each number you can swap the position of the numbers. After each try the color of the number will change to show you how close you have been to guess the correct combination
help.firstExample: The number 4 apears on the combination o the right position
help.secondExample: The number 1 apeats on the combination but is not on the right position.
help.thirdExample: The number 2 dosent apear on the combination.
help.lastText: Press START to play the game. Carefull! Once you beging you wont be able to stop the timer.
